thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 52 of 3505
thread.title: CLJ

author: CLJ
title: CLJ
text:
Thrift Books has a large collection of books, and while they aren't always in stock, I found the textbook I needed for class, and a book I really wanted for great prices! There was a small error somewhere, and my shipment was placed on hold, but once it was settled, they upgraded my shipment to expedited shipping, which got the books to me in a couple short days. The customer service was excellent and speedy, the site is easy to use, and the prices are wonderful.
I would gladly recommend to anyone who is looking for books of leisure, or education.
